CustomField.description: For use in flow to set billing/shipping street
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISBLANK(TEXT(Country__c)), TEXT(Country__c) = 'NL'), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(PO_Box_Number__c)), "Postbus "&PO_Box_Number__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Freepost_number__c)), "Antwoordnummer "&Freepost_number__c, Street__c&" "& House_Number__c&" "&House_Letter__c&" "&House_Number_Addition__c ) ), TRIM(Address_Line_1__c&" "&Address_Line_2__c) )
CustomField.label: Full Street Name
